text: Alan J Gornall (born 1960), is a male retired cyclist who competed for England. ==Cycling career== He represented England and competed in the road race and won a gold medal in the road team time trial with Deno Davie, Keith Reynolds and Paul Curran, at the 1986 Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland. He was a professional from 1987-1989. ==Personal life== His sister Linda Gornall was also an England international cyclist. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:English male cyclists Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in cycling Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for England Category:Cyclists at the 1986 Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Alan Gornall
